definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: strong, mighty, fierce;—´[[ע]] abs. Nu 13:28 + 2 t., [[עָז]] Ju Jdg 14:18, [[עָָז]] Am 5:9 + 4 t.; [[עַז]] cstr. De 28:50, Da 8:23; f. [[עַזׇּה]] Ex 14:21 + 2 t.; pl. [[עַזִּים]] Ez Eze 7:24 + 3 t.; f. [[עַזּוֹת]] Pr 18:23; cstr. [[עַזֵּי]] Is 56:11; —strong, mighty, wind Ex 14:21 (J); border Nu 21:24 (JE), but rd. prob. [[יַעְזֵר]] (LXX Di al.) Yaïzer was t. border; of people Pr 30:25 (fig. of ants), [[מַיִם]] [[עַזִּים]] Is 43:16 (‖[[הַיׇּם]]), Ne 9:11; of love Ct So 8:6; = subst. the mighty Am 5:9, Ez Eze 7:24 + Pr 24:5 (of physical force; rdg. [[טוֹב מֵעַז]] or the like LXX SyrVer Targum Kmp:Kau Wild Toy); formidable, fierce, of lion Ju Jdg 14:18, so (= subst.) v:Jdg 14:14, of king Is 19:4 (‖[[אֲדׂנִים קָשֶׁה]], of people Nu 13:28 (JE), Is 25:3 (‖[[עָרִיחִים]]); of enemy 2Sa 22:18 = Ps 18:18, so as subst. Ps 59:4; [[עַז פָּנִים]] De 28:50 fierce of countenance, Da 8:23, so perh. = impudent Ec 8:1 (rdg. [[עַז]] for [[עׂז]] q. v.); of anger ([[אַף]]) Ge 49:7 (poem in J), wrath ([[חֵמָה]]) Pr 21:14; [[הַכְּלָבִים עַזֵּי־נֶפֶשׁ]] Is 56:11 dogs fierce of appetite (‖[[לאׁ יׇֽדְעוּ שָׂבְעָה]]); fpl. as adv. accus. [[יַעֲנֶה עַזּוֹת]] Pr 18:23 the rich answereth fiercely.
